'''{{Pagename nd}}''' is a {{lc:Ingredient}} in {{poe2}}.

It is the only ingredient in an alternate recipe used to upgrade [Exceptional](/exceptional/) quality items to [Superb](/superb/) quality.

{{Description |{{#var:description}}}}
